patthana8.74:1.1: Nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.74:2.1: Naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.74:3.1: Nasaraṇañca naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.74:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
